file_insights.changes: Added i18n translation integration to Header component
file_insights.impact: Extracted 11 hardcoded strings to translation keys for internationalization support
key_modifications: Added destructuring of t function in component
Replaced all static strings with t() calls using hierarchical key structure
Used parameterized translations for dynamic content (equipment name, meeting details, material info)

patterns_discovered.benefit: Organized namespace prevents key collisions and improves maintainability

patterns_discovered.description: Complex strings with dynamic content use translation parameters (e.g., { name: 'Concrete Pump CP-200' })
patterns_discovered.benefit: Enables proper localization of formatted content while keeping strings translatable

patterns_discovered.description: Single useTranslation hook call at component level with no additional state management
patterns_discovered.benefit: Clean, efficient implementation with minimal performance overhead

gotchas_discovered.description: Translation keys use inline parameters that must be coordinated between code and translation files
gotchas_discovered.impact: Translation files must define placeholders matching the parameter names (name, date, time, material, quantity)
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Requires careful documentation and testing of parameter names in i18n configuration files

gotchas_discovered.description: Some strings are standalone labels (Profile, Settings) while others are notification content with parameters
gotchas_discovered.impact: Translation complexity varies; requires different translation key structures
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consistent naming convention helps but implementation details may become complex

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully extracted and translated all Header component strings using react-i18next
work_completed: Extracted 11+ hardcoded strings to translation keys
Applied parameterized translations for dynamic content
Single commit with clean, focused changes
approach_outcome.scope_adherence: Met requirements exactly - extracted Notifications, Profile, Settings, Logout and related content strings

recommendations.rationale: All 11+ translation keys must be defined in i18n configuration files (en, es, fr, etc.)
recommendations.action: Generate translation JSON/YAML files with all header keys and parameterized placeholders

recommendations.rationale: Parameter names (name, date, time, material, quantity) must be documented for translator reference
recommendations.action: Create translation guide specifying which keys accept parameters and what they represent

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting notification content to data structure
recommendations.rationale: Hardcoded notification items in component could be moved to configuration or API
recommendations.action: Evaluate refactoring notification menu items into data-driven approach for future scalability

recommendations.rationale: Verify all translation keys are properly defined and parameters are correctly passed
recommendations.action: Create unit tests to validate translation key existence and parameter matching

recommendations.rationale: Header uses 'header.' namespace; ensure all components follow similar pattern
recommendations.action: Document i18n namespace conventions for consistent application across codebase
